frontmatter.title: NASA Space App Challenge: Dream Space Simulator

node.html: A virtual reality system which is an integration of a dynamic chair with directional vibration feedback, a glove which allows the user to interact in the virtual reality and an AI bot which acts as an astronaut's assistant.

AI and Augmented reality based​ ​home automation intelligent assistant which uses natural language processing to assist the user in controlling electrical appliances using voice or augmented reality and performs intelligent conversations
An android app intended for students studying in VIT Vellore campus with the purpose of answering day-to-day queries utilizing AI and natural language processing techniques
